description: Roman du Bon Chevalier Tristan, Fils au Bon Roy Meliadus de Leonois; Jeanne de Montbaston and others (French, active about 1320 - 1355); Paris, France; 1320 to 1340; Tempera colors, gold paint, and silver and gold leaf on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with tan calf; Leaf: 39.4 × 29.8 cm (15 1/2 × 11 3/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 5; J.
